items.title: Lakuna/Umbra: Lightweight JavaScript game framework, WebGL, and math library.

items.content_html: MicroLib is the first (and only) framework for Federated Microservices. It's a lightweight service built on Node.js and WebAssembly that uses module federation to host and integrate multiple, independently deployable "microservice libraries" running in the same process. The idea is to eliminate or ameliorate the "microservices premium" and the trade-off between deployment independence and operational complexity.
items.title: module-federation/microlib: MicroLib is the first (and only) framework for Federated Microservices. It's a lightweight service built on Node.js and WebAssembly that uses module federation to host and integrate multiple, independently deployable "microservice libraries" running in the same process.  The idea is to eliminate or ameliorate  the "microservices premium" and the trade-off between deployment independence and operational complexity.
